comments:
M5

I ran the PDE export wizard (exporting one project to zip file) immediately
after starting the eclipse session.  The builder was still running at the time.
The PDE Export job never finished (wouldn't clear from the Progress view,
blocked the workspace from closing).  The following stack dump was in my log
(repeated several times).

!ENTRY org.eclipse.pde.core 4 4 Dec 15, 2003 12:11:18.596
!MESSAGE PDE Core: Runtime support of the wrong type:
org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.DefaultRuntimeSupport
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.resources 4 2 Dec 15, 2003 12:11:18.612
!MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in:
"org.eclipse.core.resources".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.PDECore.initializeModels(PDECore.java:423)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.PDECore.getWorkspaceModelManager(PDECore.java:356)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.builders.ManifestConsistencyChecker.build(ManifestConsistencyChecker.java:128)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager$2.run(BuildManager.java:482)
	at
org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.InternalPlatform.run(InternalPlatform.java:1127)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Platform.run(Platform.java:464)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.basicBuild(BuildManager.java:130)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.basicBuild(BuildManager.java:201)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.basicBuild(BuildManager.java:156)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager$1.run(BuildManager.java:182)
	at
org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.InternalPlatform.run(InternalPlatform.java:1127)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Platform.run(Platform.java:464)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.basicBuild(BuildManager.java:185)
	at
org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.basicBuildLoop(BuildManager.java:219)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.build(BuildManager.java:247)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.AutoBuildJob.doBuild(AutoBuildJob.java:76)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.AutoBuildJob.run(AutoBuildJob.java:112)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:62)

different manifestation of the same problem.
We know for sure now that it has something to do with background building.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 47255 ***
